definition: to form/to organize/group/team/classifier for sets, series, groups of people, batteries
to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth

pinyin: bi4 bu4 ke3 shao3 zu3 cheng2

sentences.english: Network tolling is the important part of network administration.
sentences.chinese: 网络收费是网络管理的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: Island group from the volcanic island and cays .
sentences.chinese: 岛群由火山岛和珊瑚礁组成。

sentences.english: The team of contributors is generally responsible for the project area and everything in it.
sentences.chinese: 贡献者组成的团队一般负责该项目区域和其中的一切。

sentences.english: The scheme is mainly composed of center station and substation.
sentences.chinese: 方案由调度中心站和子站组成。

sentences.english: The powers and functions of the district organizations and the method for their formation shall be prescribed by law.
sentences.chinese: 第九十八条区域组织的职权和组成方法由法律规定。

sentences.english: The fusion body has many components.
sentences.chinese: 融合体有很多组成部分。

sentences.english: The popular PE is the major part of the whole career of PE.
sentences.chinese: 群众体育是构成整个体育事业的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: Objection to the jurisdiction is an important component of the jurisdiction system of civil litigation.
sentences.chinese: 管辖权异议制度是民事诉讼管辖制度的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: English writing assessment is an important part of the English process writing.
sentences.chinese: 英语写作评改是英语过程写作的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: Location theory is one of basic parts of economic geography.
sentences.chinese: 区位理论是现代经济地理学基本理论的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: But the elements of that economic model are universal in character.
sentences.chinese: 但是这种经济模式的组成要素是放诸四海而皆准的。

sentences.english: A sculpture at the Detroit Zoo composed of Bullets and Gold Leaf.
sentences.chinese: 雕塑在底特律动物园组成的子弹和金叶。

sentences.english: This dissertation is an important part of the Tenth Five-year National defense preparatory Plan.
sentences.chinese: 本文是“十五”国防预研课题的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: Describes the constitution, principle and the latest of Homodialysis Machine.
sentences.chinese: 详细介绍了血液透析机的组成原理及最新进展。

sentences.english: Conclusions The non-natives are the major component of TB patients in Shenzhen.
sentences.chinese: 结论外来人口是深圳市结核病疫情的主要组成部分。

sentences.english: The first group included 38 cultivated species.
sentences.chinese: 第一类由38份栽培青麻组成。

definition: to constitute/to form/to compose/to make up/to configure (computing)
to follow/from/it is for...to/reason/cause/because of/due to/to/to leave it (to sb)/by (introduces passive verb)
to divide (into)/to split a bonus/to break into/tenths/percentage allotment
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
to comprise/to include/to involve/to incorporate/to consist of
representative/delegate/CL:位[wei4],個|个[ge4],名[ming2]/to represent/to stand for/on behalf of/in the name of
